scripts.watchWb: npx nodemon --watch workbox -x "npm run wbInject -- workbox/workbox-config.js" &
scripts.dev: npx rimraf dist && npx run-p watchWb parcelDev
scripts.build: npx rimraf docs && npm run wbInject -- workbox/workbox-config.js && parcel build index.html --out-dir docs --public-url /pwa-test/ && npm run wbInject -- workbox/workbox-config.prod.js
